mapper.sql:
SELECT aspc_pk, aspc_codigo, aspc_tpsr_pk
, aspv_pk, aspv_fini, aspv_ffin, aspv_prioridad , aspv_cpath_info1, aspv_cpath_info2, aspv_cpath_info3, aspv_cpath_info4, aspv_cpath_info5, aspv_cpath_info6 , aspv_cetiq_info1, aspv_cetiq_info2, aspv_cetiq_info3, aspv_cetiq_info4, aspv_cetiq_info5, aspv_cetiq_info6 , aspv_cgrp_info1, aspv_cgrp_info2, aspv_cgrp_info3, aspv_cgrp_info4, aspv_cgrp_info5, aspv_cgrp_info6 , aspv_lsum_cuant1, aspv_lsum_cuant2, aspv_lsum_cuant3, aspv_lsum_cuant4, aspv_lsum_cuant5, aspv_lsum_cuant6 , aspv_lgrp_info1, aspv_lgrp_info2, aspv_lgrp_info3, aspv_lgrp_info4, aspv_lgrp_info5, aspv_lgrp_info6
, ( SELECT enti_tipo FROM tbl_entidad_enti WHERE enti_pk = aspc_tpsr_pk ) AS enti_tipo
, #{fechaVigencia} AS aspc_fref
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'aspv' AND i18n_ext_pk = aspv_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS aspv_descripcion
FROM tbl_aspecto_aspc INNER JOIN tbl_aspecto_version_aspv ON aspv_aspc_pk = aspc_pk

where.if: AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc WHERE vlrc_aspc_pk = aspc_pk AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN aspv_fini AND COALESCE(aspv_ffin, vlrc_fref) AND vlrc_pk = #{vlrcId} )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_aspecto_aspc INNER JOIN tbl_aspecto_version_aspv ON aspv_aspc_pk = aspc_pk

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_cargo_vlrg WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_aspecto_cargo_ascr WHERE ascr_crgo_pk = vlrg_crgo_pk AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_aspecto_version_aspv WHERE aspv_aspc_pk = ascr_aspc_pk AND #{fechaFacturacion} BETWEEN aspv_fini AND COALESCE(aspv_ffin, #{fechaFacturacion}) AND aspv_aspc_pk = #{aspc.id} ) ) AND vlrg_vlrc_pk IN
#{item}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_aspecto_aspc WHERE aspc_codigo = #{codigo} AND aspc_tpsr_pk = #{tpsr.id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_aspecto_aspc INNER JOIN tbl_aspecto_version_aspv ON aspv_aspc_pk = aspc_pk WHERE aspc_pk = #{id} AND ( #{version.fini} BETWEEN aspv_fini AND COALESCE(aspv_ffin, #{version.fini}) OR COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime()) BETWEEN aspv_fini AND COALESCE(aspv_ffin, COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime())) )
AND aspv_pk <> #{version.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_aspecto_aspc (aspc_pk, aspc_codigo, aspc_tpsr_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{codigo}, #{tpsr.id})
